    • Constructor Detail

      • Gremlin

        public Gremlin(int x,
               int y,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> sprites,
               processing.core.PImage projectileSprite,
               int row,
               int column,
               float cooldown,
               java.util.ArrayList<Slime> slimes)
        Constructor method for Gremlin. Sets values of default attributes. Sets random initial direction of Gremlin.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprites - images of Gremlin (normal and frozen versions)
        projectileSprite - image of Gremlin's slime
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on window grid
        cooldown - cooldown period for Gremlin to shoot slimes
        slimes - list of all slimes shot by Gremlin

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                 Wizard wizard,
                 java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> allGremlins)
        Updates counter for slime shooting and counter for respawn if Gremlin is not alive. Checks collisions with other GameObjects and triggers movement. Updates row and column numbers of Gremlin.
        Parameters:
        allTiles - list containing all tiles on the GameMap
        wizard - Wizard object on the GameMap
        allGremlins - list containing all Gremlin objects (including this instance) on GameMap

      • setInitialDirection

        public void setInitialDirection()
        Sets random initial direction for Gremlin's movement when game starts up

      • randomMovement

        public void randomMovement(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles)
        Chooses random direction for Gremlin movement from available directions that will not cause collision
        Parameters:
        allTiles - list containing all tile objects on GameMap

      • getValidDirections

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getValidDirections(java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles)
        Checks collision for each direction
        Parameters:
        allTiles - list containing all tile objects on GameMap
        Returns:
        list of all possible movements for Gremlin

      • getSideDir

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getSideDir()
        Finds side directions (left and right) depending on where Gremlin is facing
        Returns:
        list of side directions

      • toggleMovement

        public void toggleMovement(int dir)
        Switches movement directions according to direction number given
        Parameters:
        dir - direction to make Gremlin move in (0 for left, 1 for right, 2 for up, 3 for down)

      • shootSlime

        public void shootSlime(processing.core.PImage slimeSprite,
                       java.util.ArrayList<Slime> slimes)
        Starts sequence for slime shooting and adds slime object into list of all slimes on map. Starts counter for cooldown before next shoot
        Parameters:
        slimeSprite - image of slime
        slimes - list containing all slime objects on GameMap

      • respawn

        public void respawn(Wizard wizard,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                    java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> allGremlins)
        Respawns Gremlin at a random location on map. Location is at least 10 tiles away from Wizard and does not overlap with other objects
        Parameters:
        wizard - Wizard object on map
        allTiles - list containing all tiles on map
        allGremlins - list containing all Gremlins on map

      • addNumbersToRange

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> addNumbersToRange(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> rangeNumbers,
                                                                int min,
                                                                int max)
        Helper function for Gremlin respawn. Adds numbers between a range into a existing list.
        Parameters:
        rangeNumbers - existing list
        min - lower bound of range
        max - upper bound of range
        Returns:
        updated list containing new range of numbers

      • getRandomCoord

        public int getRandomCoord(int bound)
        Generates random coordinate
        Parameters:
        bound - upper bound for coordinate
        Returns:
        random coordinate within bound

      • checkOverlap

        public boolean checkOverlap(int newRow,
                            int newColumn,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Tile> allTiles,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Gremlin> allGremlins)
        Checks if the row and column numbers overlap with other objects on map
        Parameters:
        newRow - row number on window grid to be checked
        newColumn - column number on window grid to be checked
        allTiles - list containing all tiles on map
        allGremlins - list containing all Gremlins on map
        Returns:
        true if new coordinates overlap with another object on map

      • freeze

        public int freeze()
        Freezes Gremlin when Powerup is absorbed by Wizard by stopping Gremlin movement. Chnages sprite of Gremlin to its frozen version
        Returns:
        current velocity of Gremlin

      • unfreeze

        public int unfreeze()
        Unfreezes Gremlin and changes sprite back to its normal version
        Returns:
        current velocity of Gremlin
